data.text: @EU_Commission @vonderleyen Pure racism is your / EU approach to Kosovo and its citizens!  We live in the ghetto, thanks to your racism!  Shame on you!
@EU_Commission As an eu27 citizen, I am a stakeholder. Yet, no one questioned me

@EU_Commission I wish EU organisations would stop with this pathetic populism etc. and instead be honest and use facts all (!) the time. EU27 are going to have a tough time: economically because of cov2 and culturally because of rise in hate/racism. And yet, nobody seems to see the latter 🤢
@EU_Commission Please lift the travel ban for families and couples from overseas. We are suffering every day. Let us be with our loved ones #liftthetravelban

@EU_Commission Lol Twitter removing all negative messages about the EU. You guys are worse then China and USSR are combined. Who needs a government like that. We need to bring the EU down before it destroys Europe. #NEXIT

@EU_Commission @Twitter @TwitterSupport Are you hiding comments to this tweet? The topic shows 22 responses, yet it only shows 4. 
Are your suppressing people's opinion? I guess so much for free speech. The EU is not better then China. Nor is Twitter. Shame on you.

@EU_Commission Lol has the EU asked twitter to remove all anti-EU messages. 
21 comments on this message. It only shows 3. I wouldn't be surprised. The EU does propaganda like the USSR in , so silencing people would be in line with that.
@EU_Commission #BetterTogether
@EU_Commission Are those numbers right? Do you mean Europe or EU? I thought Europe was 9.8% already and the rest of the world isn’t growing that fast nor is Europe shrinking
@EU_Commission I dont have spotify
@EU_Commission It is important though that these negotiations are not drawn out and consensus is arrived at soon. The longer these negotiations go on for, the worse will the economy get.

@EU_Commission An idea but the earth is limited
Borders will explode
@EU_Commission What about Holland? They are Europen whit money of Italians Firm, rights?
@EU_Commission Rich non-EU countries like |🇨🇭 | 🇳🇴 |🇬🇧 which want to keep their privileged access to the EU markets and EU agencies need to make a much bigger contribution to EU budgets
@EU_Commission please, why is our future digital? We will not accept forced neurolinks 😊😉

@EU_Commission By 2050 Europe will not be Europe.
It will be the New Africa and the New Middle East.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo No one hears our voice,
No one calls for our right,
No country asks for our files,
Neither quick process for our files,nor equility in treat
Is it fault of being Iraqis?
Is being Iraqi refugees a sin?
Is fleeing of a personal death threat a crime?
4to8yrs of wait in Turkey r hard

@EU_Commission Why is doc only available in English? Should be available languages of at very least the 6 founding nations🤨
@PhilHoganEU
@EU_Commission Get rid of #MadeInChina

@EU_Commission Is not that we dont want to have kids... we just can't afford it, We not at our grandparents times were only one person working can provide, buy a house etc! That's what @EU_Commission  should focus on fixing! Our generation is broken our backs can only hold for so long...

@EU_Commission Sounds a lot like making Europe great again or MEGA..... 
Except for the difference that it is the EU that first demolished it. Something about Greeks, who bring gifts....
@EU_Commission In other words?

@EU_Commission The UK just needs out and to look after it's own country instead of ploughing money we could have spent in our own country so every other country could benefit. #brexit! Hurry up December!
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen 100%!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Maybe it’s your moto so let us start with you. How many migrants live at your home? None? Why?

Where is humanity?
Does the world want to finish us by its neglecting of our files?
We need urgent help..
It is unfair to leave us wait all these years..every year with different causes.
Be fair&mercy.
@EU_Commission @SusanHayes_ Shouldn't all populations be getting smaller to protect the earth?

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @eucopresident @AndrejPlenkovic Sr. Sassoli!!,
NO se le ocurra venir a esta manipulación que quiere hacer el Gobierno de Sánchez!!!.
Exija antes!! las cifras dadas por los Registros Civiles, las Funerarias, el INE, etc . 
Por respeto a TODOS nuestros familiares, amigos y vecinos!!!

@EU_Commission The EU deliberately wants to change the demography of EU countries,by supporting NGO’s. They are arranging vessels to transport illegal immigrants from African countries. The opinion of all EU citizens seems not to be important .

@EU_Commission It will look Muslim, if you keep our borders wide opening. Like it is now. 
And merging with Africa will be the death of Europe. You powermongers are batshitcrazy.
@EU_Commission @pierremoscovici @vonderleyen So don’t be racists against italians...
@EU_Commission Today is Summer Solstice. #SummerSolstice2020

@EU_Commission SOS SPAIN
The Spanish Communist Goverment are restringed our liberties and free liberty expression.
The Government lies with the quantity of death persons from COVID 19.
22 Ministers and a very high state cost. Please need a European intervention 🇪🇦🇪🇦
@EU_Commission Addressing anything usefully first requires overcoming suspicion and recovering lost trust.

@EU_Commission The thing is: we have read the studies and seen the statistics about the ageing population and the rather gleam future ahead us. What we haven't seen is a plan or even better actions that will help us go through that. Actions that will ensure better future for the working classes
@EU_Commission Why don’t we use the German one in all states? It’s efficient, it’s privacy-protective & it’s already in operation

@EU_Commission In Spain there are 48,000 deaths from Covid-19 ! The corrupt communist fascist party of @sanchezcastejon only admits 27,000 deaths ! They are lying even with the pain of the families of the deceased !

@EU_Commission no matter how many people live there or there.  It is important to empower everyone to take responsibility for themselves and their actions.  Focus on the wellbeing of all humanity and everything that lives and thrives on earth.
@EU_Commission So let refugees become european, if you want to keep the same number, or incite women to have more children. I incite my children not to have some in these conditions nowadays....
@EU_Commission @exscalate4cov Fuck your new world order, the EU will be done in 5 years. Enjoy the time you have left.
@EU_Commission There's a medicin ! The people will only die from your vaccine ! Dont take it. Its not save! They have no right to put that in your body !

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen There are medicin that works but they forbidden!! We dont want a vaccin! You have no right to put that in the people! Vaccines are not save that fast and you know that! NO VACCINE.youre not god!
@EU_Commission @julietlodge2 How dare the EU protect the people.

@EU_Commission It will definitely get smaller if the governments don’t give parents breathing space. Salaries are almost not enough to survive with, bills and taxes to be paid.Having kids is almost out of plan for most people because the government makes it difficult or discouraging to have any
@EU_Commission Freedom for #Junqueras and all political prisoners in #Europe
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen NO! STOP MANIPULATING THE CITIZENS!!!
@EU_Commission Please open borders to the EU for fiancé’s from the US! #LiftTheTravelBan
@EU_Commission I am engaged to a German. I am American. Please make exemptions for US citizen who have partners in EU. #LiftTheTravelBan
@EU_Commission make exemptions for fiancé’s from the US trying to get to Germany to marry.

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Please make an exception for people in long-term or engaged relationships with EU citizens to reunite safely with their partners. Denmark did it; the EU can recommend that all members do the same! International families 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 and couples 👩‍❤️‍👨 are 💔💔 #LiftTheTravelBan

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @eucopresident @AndrejPlenkovic Pleas make an exception for long-term and engaged couples to reunite for #FamilyReunification. Denmark did it; the EU can recommend that other countries do the same! International families 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 and couples 👩‍❤️‍👨 are so desperate and 💔💔 #LiftTheTravelBan

@EU_Commission @EUCouncil @MFA_MKD @eu_near @PolandMFA. Nobody knows what a refugee feels except a refugee and its family. Both my parents were refugees once in North Macedonia and then in Poland during the war in 🇽🇰. Now, 21 years after we thank you for your support during bad times. 🇽🇰🇲🇰🇵🇱🇪🇺

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo What will you call:leaving Iraqi asylum seekers and refugees wait for resettlement for3 to8 years in the host countries with no solution?
They lost everything in their homeland and during the escape journy..but the long wait for resettlement exhausted them

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo Refugees are:oppressed people stuck among the harsh situation in their countries,the difficult life in host countries& the neglect of the whole world for their cases.
That's exactly what's happening with the Iraqi asylum seekers&refugees
SOS pls.
#StandWithIraqiRefugees
In Turkey

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees fled their country,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees faced death threat,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are suffering from the long wait for resettlement,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are forgotten.
#StandWithIraqiRefugees
In Turkey
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Will this strong condemn of racism include how Spain is acting against Catalans? Or again you will ignore what's happening there and silently accept what Spain is doing?

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We are Iraqi refugees in Turkey since 2014/2015. We have lost years of our life and we are waiting for a third country to live safely away from war. We are university and secondary students. We hope to speed up our files to get a safe country.

@EU_Commission @EPP @vonderleyen Empty words
There is no place for racism anywhere
Yet you allow racism against whites
You allow women to be raped 10000 yearly in Sweden
You are impotent empty shell empty words
A politician in Brussels throat is slashed
Solve real issues stop  antifa blm islamist B4 they ruin u

Home is aplace that you make it.
We are Iraqi  refugees in  Turkey waiting for along time.
#StandWithIraqiRefugees

Global Compact #ForRefugees Dec2018,
20June2019(Refugee Day),
Passed with no results,
More stuck asylum seekers& refugees in hosts,

Less resettlement,

Iraqi refugees who can't return to Iraq because of death threat were neglected by the whole world .

#StandWithIraqiRefugees

@EU_Commission I never thought the borders can be closed so fast. I never thought international couples can get torn apart so easily. Please set a sign for a united world and let us unite with our loved ones again. Travel bans are separating couples 
#loveisessential
#loveisnottourism
🗺️❤️
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Corruption queen cannot be taken seriously.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We are Iraqi refugees in Turkey, we face unknown fate becuse of the delay of processing our cases since 2013/2014 till now. We ask you for an urgent solution
If you want to contact the representative of Iraqi refugees in Turkey to know more about Iraqi asylum seekers and refugees

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen I never thought the borders can be closed so fast. I never thought international couples can get torn apart so easily. Please set a sign for a united world and let us unite with our loved ones again. Travel bans are separating couples already since many months
#loveisessential

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo اطفالنا في حرمان من كل مقومات الحياة السعيدة . فهم ليس مثل اقرانهم لم يعيشو طفولتهم كما ينبغي . والسبب عدم استقرار الاسرة بالكامل وعدم توفر وطن وعدم توفر عمل وبالتالي ينعكس على الاطفال بالسلبية .ارجوكم نحن نطمح لوطن لا غير . انقذونا من اجل اطفالنا

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo To the human rights of humanity. We appeal to you to save lraqi refugees in turkey since 2013. Help us to find a safe country for our children and  young people. We are tired of waiting for informtion. We are legal refugees. We respect the law

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We, the Iraqi refugees 🇮🇶in Turkey from 2013/2014/2015/2016. Today, we and our children are very bad now ... and on behalf of humanity🙏, please ask every official 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇳🇿🇨🇦🇪🇺to help speed up our files to the settlement country.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo What about the Int'l Convention on protection of the rights of refugees&asylum seekers who've waited a safe life for long yrs with no respond?
Iraqi refugees who can't return to Iraq because of death threat were neglected by the whole world .

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo Hello 🙋‍♂️ To the whole world..solve the files of Iraqi refugees in Turkey
 I am an Iraqi refugee in Turkey since 2014
 I am still alive
 I am still waiting for resettlement
 I hope you do not forget that I am with you on the planet Earth
 thank you

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo No one hears our voice,
No one calls for our right,
No country asks for our files,
Neither quick process for our files,nor equility in treat
Is it fault of being Iraqis?
Is being Iraqi refugees a sin?
Is fleeing of a personal death threat a crime?
4to8yrs of wait in Turkey r hard

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We are Iraqi refugees, tired of the long wait in Turkey. Our country is not safe and the situation has become very bad. We are calling for speeding up of resolving our files. The future of our children is in danger.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We thank every person for all that you do for the refugees, but please do not forget the Iraqi refugee in Turkey, he is marginalized and his file is neglected and suffers from exclusion to find settlement.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo No one hears our voice,
No one calls for our right,
No country asks for our files,
Neither quick process for our files,nor equility in treat
Is it fault of being Iraqis?
Is being Iraqi refugees a sin?
Is fleeing of a personal death threat a crime?
4to8yrs of wait in Turkey r hard

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo Today the world must inform the truth about our suffering, we Iraqi refugees in Turkey. Enough negligence and indifference in resolving our files. Today you must do justice to the Iraqi refugees in Turkey. Their waiting period lasted 5-7 years.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo All Iraqi refugees in Turkey ask about the reason for discrimination in resolving refugee files. Why is the Iraqi refugee waiting for 5-7 years unlike other nationalities? We want to communicate our voice to the world

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We are Iraqi refugees in Turkey who are registered in 2014 as legitimate refugees, not illegal.  We escaped death, murder, terror and we brought you a homeland we want life for me and my children 
#StandWithIraqiRefugees

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo Today, the world celebrates the Day of Refugees. We would like to draw your attention to the fact that there are a number of forgotten Iraqi refugees in Turkey since 5-7 years whose files have not changed. Please take care of us.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees fled their country,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees faced death threat,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are suffering from the long wait for resettlement,
IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are forgotten.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo We are Iraqi refugees in Turkey since 2014/2015. We have lost years of our life and we are waiting for a third country to live safely away from war. We are university and secondary students. We hope to speed up our files to get a safe country.

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo As much as you resettle refugees,you do your job best.
As much as you resettle refugees,you rescue families from death.
As much as you resettle equally,you feel peace with yourself.
Iraqi refugees&asylum seekers ask you to rescue them from the long waiting

@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @eu_echo IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees fled their country,IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees faced death threat,IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are suffering from the long wait for resettlement,IRAQI asylum seekers and refugees are forgotten.
